description: 52' is printed at the foot of the title page.| Dated from examination of text and style.| Title page includes illustration of a girl with a bird perched on her hand. There is no border on the title page. This differs from the copies at Mas.619(7), [Ao].8/3.3(12), L.C.2852.C(1) and Mas.618(14). The text is identical.
